name: Brave guns - Defense game
description:
※Introduction
●The dastardly Black Rabbit and his gang have appeared in the peaceful Bunny Town!
●Alongside your fun and trusted friends, protect Bunny Town from its enemies as its new sheriff!
●Bunny Town is a simple shooting action game for users of all ages. The stage “Protect Bunny Town” doubles the fun since you must also handle the strategic defense of Bunny Town using a variety of stats and upgrades.
●Bunny Town sets itself apart from other shooting and defense games with a totally new level of fun and action!

※Features
●"Train hard and you'll survive!"
- Make your character stronger with various upgrades.
●"Take out the enemies with a powerful single strike or use a special skill!"
- Use a variety of skills to fend off enemies when the odds are stacked against you.
●"I’ll take care of anyone that you miss. You can count on me. *Hiccup*"
- Mercenaries provides the support you need in battle and even give extra stats.
●"Trust yourself, and luck will follow."
- Upgrade items to acquire even more powerful items. Combine items to acquire higher-class items.
●"Look at ‘em all… Oh, well… I’m sure you’ll manage them all just fine."
- Play “Unlimited" Stages to acquire advanced items and compete against other users.

Fan page : https://www.facebook.com/bunnytowngame
